name: Let's Be Magical!
description:
Introduction

Let's Be Magical is a Breathless game about magical girls balancing school life, relationships, and fighting against the forces of evil. Its primary influence is the Precure franchise, but can accommodate anything from Sailor Moon to Madoka Magica.

Features
  • Rules-light gameplay focused on crafting a harrowing-but-hopeful magical girl experience
  • 8 Archetypes to embody classic magical girl characters
  • Tables for motifs, magical friends, colors and elements, school clubs, sample NPCs, and notable locations
  • More to come in the future!

Find more by Sustain a Spell at the following locations:
